verses.translation: Ta, Seen, Meem.
verses.transliteration: Taa-Seeen-Meeem

verses.translation: These are the verses of the clear Book.
verses.transliteration: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Mubeen

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
verses.transliteration: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen

verses.arabic: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
verses.transliteration: In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
verses.transliteration: Faqad kazzaboo fasa yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
verses.transliteration: Awa lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inn fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely is a sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
verses.transliteration: Wa iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani'-til qawmaz zaalimeen

verses.translation: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
verses.transliteration: Qawma Fir'awn; alaa yattaqoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon

verses.arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
verses.translation: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
verses.transliteration: Wa yadeequ sadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa arsil ilaa Haaroon

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.translation: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
verses.transliteration: Wa lahum 'alaiya zambun fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
verses.transliteration: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon

segments.translation: He said Nay go both of you with Our Signs
Indeed, We are with you listening

verses.arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
verses.transliteration: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

verses.translation: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
verses.transliteration: An arsil ma'anaa Baneee Israaa'eel

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
verses.transliteration: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw wa labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen

verses.arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
verses.transliteration: Wa fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta wa anta minal kaafireen

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw wa ana minad daaaleen

verses.arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
verses.transliteration: Fafarartu minkum lam maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw wa ja'alanee minal mursaleen

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
verses.transliteration: Wa tilka ni'matun tamun nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel

verses.translation: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul 'aalameen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen

segments.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them
segments.transliteration: qāla rabbu l-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā

segments.translation: if you should be convinced

verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala liman hawlahooo alaa tastami'oon

verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
verses.transliteration: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi wa maa baina humaa in kuntum ta'qiloon

segments.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ
segments.translation: He said Lord of the east and the west and whatever is between them
segments.transliteration: qāla rabbu l-mashriqi wal-maghribi wamā baynahumā

segments.translation: if you were to reason

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
verses.transliteration: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la aj'alannaka minal masjooneen

verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala awalw ji'tuka bishai'im mubeen

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.transliteration: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
verses.transliteration: Fa alqaa 'asaahu fa izaaa hiya su'baanum mubeen

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.translation: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa zireen

verses.arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
verses.transliteration: Qaala lilmala-i hawlahooo inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.translation: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
verses.transliteration: Yureedu ai yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa taamuroon

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo arjih wa akhaahu wab'as filmadaaa'ini haashireen

verses.translation: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
verses.transliteration: Yaatooka bikulli sah haarin 'aleem

verses.translation: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
verses.transliteration: Fa jumi'as saharatu limeeqaati Yawmim ma'loom

verses.translation: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela linnaasi hal antum mujtami'oon

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
verses.transliteration: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
verses.transliteration: Falammaa jaaa'as saharatu qaaloo li Fir'awna a'inna lanaa la ajjran in kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen

verses.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
verses.transliteration: Qaala na'am wa innakum izal laminal muqarrabeen

words.translation: the ones who are brought near

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.translation: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
verses.transliteration: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.translation: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
verses.transliteration: Fa alqaw hibaalahum wa 'isiyyahum wa qaaloo bi'izzati Fir'awna innaa lanahnul ghaaliboon

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.translation: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
verses.transliteration: Fa alqaa Moosaa 'asaahu fa izaa hiya talqafu maa yaafikoon

verses.translation: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
verses.transliteration: Fa ulqiyas saharatu saajideen

verses.translation: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbil 'aalameen

verses.translation: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
verses.transliteration: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon

verses.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
verses.transliteration: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'alla makumus sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilaafinw wa la usallibanna kum ajma'een

segments.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: He said You believed in him before [that] I gave permission to you
segments.transliteration: qāla āmantum lahu qabla an ādhana lakum

segments.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ
segments.translation: Indeed, he is surely your chief who has taught you the magic so surely soon you will know
segments.transliteration: innahu lakabīrukumu alladhī ʿallamakumu l-siḥ'ra falasawfa taʿlamūna

segments.arabic: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
segments.translation: I will surely cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and I will surely crucify you all
segments.transliteration: la-uqaṭṭiʿanna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin wala-uṣallibannakum ajmaʿīna

words.translation: and I will surely crucify you

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la daira innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa munqalliboon

segments.translation: They said No harm
Indeed, we to our Lord will return

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
verses.transliteration: Innaa natma'u ai yaghfira lanaa Rabbunna khataa yaanaaa an kunnaaa awwalal mu'mineen

verses.arabic: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."
verses.transliteration: Wa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadeee innakum muttaba'oon

verses.translation: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
verses.transliteration: Fa arsala Fir'awnu filmadaaa'ini haashireen

verses.translation: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
verses.transliteration: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i lashir zimatun qaleeloon

verses.translation: And indeed, they are enraging us,
verses.transliteration: Wa innahum lanaa laghaaa'izoon

verses.translation: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
verses.transliteration: Wa innaa lajamee'un haaziroon

verses.translation: So We removed them from gardens and springs
verses.transliteration: Fa akhrajnaahum min Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.translation: And treasures and honorable station -
verses.transliteration: Wa kunoozinw wa ma qaamin kareem

verses.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa Baneee Israaa'eel

words.translation: And We caused to inherit them

verses.translation: So they pursued them at sunrise.
verses.transliteration: Fa atba'oohum mushriqeen

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.translation: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
verses.transliteration: Falammaa taraaa'al jam'aani qaala as haabu Moosaaa innaa lamudrakoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
verses.transliteration: Qaala kallaaa inna ma'iya Rabbee sa yahdeen

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
verses.transliteration: Fa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa anidrib bi'asaakal bahra fanfalaqa fakaana kullu firqin kattawdil 'azeem

segments.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ
segments.translation: Then We inspired to Musa [that] Strike with your staff the sea
segments.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā ani iḍ'rib biʿaṣāka l-baḥra

segments.arabic: فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
segments.translation: So it parted and became each part like the mountain [the] great
segments.transliteration: fa-infalaqa fakāna kullu fir'qin kal-ṭawdi l-ʿaẓīmi

verses.translation: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
verses.transliteration: Wa azlafnaa sammal aakhareen

verses.translation: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
verses.transliteration: Wa anjainaa Moosaa wa mam ma'ahooo ajma'een

verses.translation: Then We drowned the others.
verses.transliteration: Summa aghraqnal aakhareen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaah; wa maa kaana aksaru hu mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely is a Sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: And recite to them the news of Abraham,
verses.transliteration: Watlu 'alaihim naba-a Ibraaheem

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maa ta'budoon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo na'budu asnaaman fanazallu lahaa 'aakifeen

verses.translation: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
verses.transliteration: Qaala hal yasma'oona kum iz tad'oon

verses.translation: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
verses.transliteration: Aw yanfa'oonakum aw yadurroon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bal wajadnaaa aabaaa 'anaa kazaalika yaf'aloon

verses.translation: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
verses.transliteration: Qaala afara 'aitum maa kuntum ta'budoon

verses.translation: You and your ancient forefathers?
verses.transliteration: Antum wa aabaaa'ukumul aqdamoon

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
verses.transliteration: Fa innahum 'aduwwwul leee illaa Rabbal 'aalameen

verses.translation: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
verses.transliteration: Allazee khalaqanee fa Huwa yahdeen

verses.translation: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
verses.transliteration: Wallazee Huwa yut'imunee wa yasqeen

verses.translation: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa mardtu fahuwa yashfeen

verses.translation: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
verses.transliteration: Wallazee yumeetunee summa yuhyeen

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
verses.transliteration: Wallazeee atma'u ai yaghfira lee khateee' atee Yawmad Deen

verses.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
verses.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee hukmanw wa alhiqnee bis saaliheen

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
verses.transliteration: Waj'al lee lisaana sidqin fil aakhireen

verses.translation: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
verses.transliteration: Waj'alnee minw warasati Jannnatin Na'eem

verses.arabic: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
verses.transliteration: Waghfir li abeee innahoo kaana mind daalleen

verses.translation: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tukhzinee Yawma yub'asoon

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children
verses.transliteration: Yawma laa yanfa'u maalunw wa laa banoon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
verses.transliteration: Illaa man atal laaha biqalbin saleem

verses.translation: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
verses.transliteration: Wa uzlifatil Jannatu lilmuttaqeen

verses.translation: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
verses.transliteration: Wa burrizatil Jaheemu lilghaaween

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
verses.transliteration: Wa qeela lahum aina maa kuntum ta'budoon

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"
verses.transliteration: Min doonil laahi hal yansuroonakum aw yantasiroon

verses.translation: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
verses.transliteration: Fakubkiboo feehaa hum walghaawoon

verses.translation: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
verses.transliteration: Wa junoodu Ibleesa ajma'oon

verses.translation: They will say while they dispute therein,
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo wa hum feehaa yakkhtasimoon

verses.arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
verses.transliteration: Tallaahi in kunnaa lafee dalaalim mubeen

verses.translation: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Iz nusawweekum bi Rabbil 'aalameen

verses.translation: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa adallanaaa illal mujrimoon

verses.translation: So now we have no intercessors
verses.transliteration: Famaa lanaa min shaa fi'een

verses.translation: And not a devoted friend.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa sadeeqin hameem

verses.arabic: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "
verses.transliteration: Falaw anna lanaa karratan fanakoona minal mu'mineen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatanw wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely is a Sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: The people of Noah denied the messengers
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat qawmu Noohinil Mursaleen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Noohun alaa tattaqoon

verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqullaaha wa atee'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

segments.translation: And not I ask of you for it any payment

segments.arabic: إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
segments.translation: Not is my payment but from the Lord of the worlds
segments.transliteration: in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi l-ʿālamīna

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me."
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.translation: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo anu'minu laka wattaba 'akal arzaloon

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
verses.transliteration: Qaala wa maa 'ilmee bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

verses.arabic: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
verses.transliteration: In hisaabuhum illaa 'alaa Rabbee law tash'uroon

segments.translation: Verily their account is but upon my Lord
if you perceive

verses.translation: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa ana bitaaridil mu'mineen

verses.translation: I am only a clear warner."
verses.transliteration: In ana illaa nazeerum mubeen

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Noohu latakoonanna minal marjoomeen

verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi inna qawmee kazzaboon

verses.arabic: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
verses.transliteration: Faftab bainee wa bai nahum fat hanw wa najjinee wa mam ma'iya minal mu'mineen

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
verses.transliteration: Fa anjainaahu wa mamma'ahoo fil fulkil mashhoon

verses.translation: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
verses.transliteration: Summa aghraqnaa ba'dul baaqeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely, is a sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: 'Aad denied the messengers
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat 'Aadunil mursaleen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Hoodun alaa tattaqoon

verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqullaaha wa atee'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

segments.translation: And not I ask you for it any payment

segments.arabic: إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
segments.translation: Not is my payment except from the Lord of the worlds
segments.transliteration: in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi l-ʿālamīna

verses.translation: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,
verses.transliteration: Atabnoona bikulli ree'in aayatan ta'basoon

verses.translation: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?
verses.transliteration: Wa tattakhizoona masaani'a la'allakum takhludoon

verses.translation: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa batashtum batashtum jabbaareen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.translation: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
verses.transliteration: Wattaqul lazeee amad dakum bimaa ta'lamoon

verses.translation: Provided you with grazing livestock and children
verses.transliteration: Amaddakum bi an'aa minw wa baneen

verses.translation: And gardens and springs.
verses.transliteration: Wa jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
verses.transliteration: Innee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alainaaa awa 'azta am lam takum minal waa'izeen

verses.translation: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,
verses.transliteration: In haazaaa illaa khuluqul awwaleen

verses.translation: And we are not to be punished."
verses.transliteration: Wa maa nahnu bimu 'azzabeen

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohu fa ahlaknaahum; inna fee zaalika la aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ
segments.translation: So they denied him then We destroyed them Indeed in that surely, is a sign
segments.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-ahlaknāhum inna fī dhālika laāyatan

segments.translation: but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: Thamud denied the messengers
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat Samoodul mursaleen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Saalihun alaa tattaqoon

verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

segments.translation: And not I ask you for it any payment

segments.arabic: إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
segments.translation: Not is my payment except from the Lord of the worlds
segments.transliteration: in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi l-ʿālamīna

verses.translation: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],
verses.transliteration: Atutrakoona fee maa haahunnaaa aamineen

verses.translation: Within gardens and springs
verses.transliteration: Fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.translation: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
verses.transliteration: Wa zuroo inw wa nakhlin tal 'uhaa hadeem

verses.translation: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
verses.transliteration: Wa tanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan faariheen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.translation: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tutee'ooo amral musrifeen

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa yuslihoon

verses.translation: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo innamaa anta minal musahhareen

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.transliteration: Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi Aayatin in kunta minas saadiqeen

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
verses.transliteration: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw w alakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem

verses.translation: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
verses.transliteration: Fa'aqaroohaa fa asbahoo naadimeen

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum m'mineen

segments.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ
segments.translation: So seized them the punishment Indeed in that surely is a sign
segments.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu l-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan

segments.translation: but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: The people of Lot denied the messengers
verses.transliteration: kazzabat qawmu Lootinil mursaleen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon

verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

segments.translation: And not I ask you for it any payment

segments.arabic: إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
segments.translation: Not is my payment except from the Lord of the worlds
segments.transliteration: in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi l-ʿālamīna

verses.translation: Do you approach males among the worlds
verses.transliteration: Ataatoonaz zukraana minal 'aalameen

verses.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.translation: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
verses.transliteration: Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon

segments.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ
segments.translation: And you leave what created for you your Lord of your mates
segments.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum

segments.translation: Nay you are a people transgressing

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
verses.transliteration: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen

verses.translation: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
verses.transliteration: Qaala innee li'amalikum minal qaaleen

verses.translation: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
verses.transliteration: Rabbi najjjinee wa ahlee mimmmaa ya'maloon

verses.translation: So We saved him and his family, all,
verses.transliteration: Fanajjainaahu wa ahlahooo ajma'een

verses.translation: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
verses.transliteration: Illaa 'ajoozan filghaabireen

verses.translation: Then We destroyed the others.
verses.transliteration: Summa dammarnal aa khareen

verses.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
verses.transliteration: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen

segments.translation: And We rained upon them a rain
and evil was was the rain on those who were warned

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely is a sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
verses.transliteration: Kazzaba As haabul Aykatil mursaleen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.transliteration: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon

verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.transliteration: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

segments.translation: And not I ask of you for it any payment

segments.arabic: إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
segments.translation: Not is my payment except from the Lord of the worlds
segments.transliteration: in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi l-ʿālamīna

verses.arabic: ۞ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.translation: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
verses.transliteration: Awful kaila wa laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen

verses.translation: And weigh with an even balance.
verses.transliteration: Wa zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa 'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

verses.translation: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
verses.transliteration: Wattaqul lazee khalaqakum waljibillatal awwaleen

verses.translation: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo innamaa anta minal musahhareen

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa wa innazunnuka laminal kaazibeen

verses.arabic: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.transliteration: Fa asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen

verses.translation: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbeee a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
verses.transliteration: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

segments.translation: But they denied him so seized them the punishment of the day of the shadow
Indeed, it was the punishment of a Day Great

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

segments.translation: Indeed in that surely, is a sign
but not are most of them believers

verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

verses.translation: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa innahoo latanzeelu Rabbil 'aalameen

verses.translation: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
verses.transliteration: Nazala bihir Roohul Ameen

verses.translation: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
verses.transliteration: 'Alaa qalbika litakoona minal munzireen

verses.translation: In a clear Arabic language.
verses.transliteration: Bilisaanin 'Arabiyyim mubeen

verses.translation: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
verses.transliteration: Wa innahoo lafee Zuburil awwaleen

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
verses.transliteration: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel

verses.translation: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
verses.transliteration: Wa law nazzalnaahu 'alaa ba'dil a'jameen

verses.arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
verses.transliteration: Faqara ahoo 'alaihim maa kaanoo bihee mu'mineen

verses.translation: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika salaknaahu fee quloobil mujrimeen

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem

verses.translation: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
verses.transliteration: Fayaatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

words.translation: And it will come to them

verses.translation: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
verses.transliteration: Fa yaqooloo hal nahnu munzaroon

verses.translation: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
verses.transliteration: Aafabi 'azaabinaa yasta'jiloon

words.translation: So is it for Our punishment

verses.translation: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
verses.transliteration: Aara'aita im matta'naahum sineen

verses.translation: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
verses.transliteration: Summa jaaa'ahum maa kaanoo yoo'adoon

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.translation: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
verses.transliteration: Maaa aghnaaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yumaatoo'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon

verses.translation: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
verses.transliteration: Zikraa wa maa kunnaa zaalimeen

verses.translation: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tanazzalat bihish Shayaateen

verses.translation: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yambaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon

verses.translation: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
verses.transliteration: Innahum 'anis sam'i lama'zooloon

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
verses.transliteration: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen

verses.translation: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
verses.transliteration: Wa anzir 'asheeratakal aqrabeen

verses.arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
verses.transliteration: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba 'aka minal mu'mineen

verses.arabic: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
verses.transliteration: Fa in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon

verses.translation: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
verses.transliteration: Wa tawakkal alal 'Azeezir Raheem

verses.translation: Who sees you when you arise
verses.transliteration: Allazee yaraaka heena taqoom

verses.translation: And your movement among those who prostrate.
verses.transliteration: Wa taqallubaka fis saajideen

verses.translation: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.transliteration: Innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

verses.arabic: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.arabicSimple: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.translation: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
verses.transliteration: Hal unabbi'ukum 'alaa man tanazzalush Shayaateen

verses.translation: They descend upon every sinful liar.
verses.transliteration: Tanazzalu 'alaa kulli affaakin aseem

verses.translation: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
verses.transliteration: Yulqoonas sam'a wa aksaruhum aaziboon

verses.translation: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
verses.transliteration: Washshu 'araaa'u yattabi 'uhumul ghaawoon

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.translation: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
verses.transliteration: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon

verses.translation: And that they say what they do not do? -
verses.transliteration: Wa annahum yaqooloona ma laa yaf'aloon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
verses.transliteration: Illal lazeena aamanoo w a'amilus saalihaati wa zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo mim ba'di maa zulimoo; wa saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya munqalbiny yanqaliboon

segments.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ
segments.translation: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah much and defend themselves after after after they were wronged
segments.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū l-ṣāliḥāti wadhakarū l-laha kathīran wa-intaṣarū min baʿdi mā ẓulimū

segments.arabic: وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
segments.translation: And will come to know those who have wronged to what return they will return
segments.transliteration: wasayaʿlamu alladhīna ẓalamū ayya munqalabin yanqalibūna
